comments.author: Simon Willnauer
comments.body: This patch add the new Version ctors and deprecates the defaiult ctor. I did not change any references as I want to split those up in smaller issues. I already changed all references which resulted in a 400k patch. We should rather do it step by step.

comments.author: Uwe Schindler
comments.body: Patch looks good, I will commit this with LUCENE-2241 in a day or two.

comments.author: Simon Willnauer
comments.body:
bq. Patch looks good, I will commit this with LUCENE-2241 in a day or two. 
cool, I will go on with LUCENE-2242 and rest of contrib once this is committed

description: Due to the Changes to CharTokenizer ( LUCENE-2183 ) WhitespaceAnalyzer and SimpleAnalyzer need a Version ctor. Default ctors must be deprecated
summary: SimpleAnalyzer and WhitespaceAnalyzer should have Version ctors
